name: eXtremeSlotRacing Free
description:
Race as fast as you can in this new Slot Racing Car Game !
Try to stay on the track or beware of the crash !
Play against one opponent and become the best Slot Racing Car pilot in the World by writing your name on the Hall Of Fame on our online World Wide HighScore System
This game is approved by gamers of all ages, from 3+ years old, and up!

★★★ Game Features ★★★

• Very Fast paced Race as only the Slot Racing games can give
• Really playable by young children from 3 years old and up to 77 !
• 3D Graphics and Animations for a realistic race
• Original music and fun sound environment
• Unique Game Experience
• Extremely addictive
